option.value: Give me 3 generic dish description. One sentence each.

option.name: content
option.value: 1. Indulge in a culinary masterpiece of succulent meats, vibrant vegetables, and rich sauces, harmoniously crafted to create an unforgettable dining experience. 2. Experience a symphony of flavors with a skillfully prepared dish that combines the finest ingredients, expert techniques, and a touch of culinary artistry. 3. Delight in a culinary journey that tantalizes the taste buds with a fusion of exotic spices, fresh ingredients, and creative presentations, leaving a lasting impression on every palate.

option.name: content
option.value: list 10 main course dishes

option.name: content
option.value: 1. Grilled steak with roasted potatoes and sautéed vegetables 2. Pan-seared salmon with lemon butter sauce served over quinoa 3. Chicken Parmesan with spaghetti marinara 4. Vegetable stir-fry with tofu and brown rice 5. Beef stew slow-cooked with herbs and root vegetables 6. Lemon herb roasted chicken with mashed potatoes and steamed asparagus 7. Shrimp scampi tossed with linguine 8. Eggplant lasagna with layers of roasted vegetables and creamy béchamel sauce 9. Barbecue ribs served with coleslaw and cornbread 10. Mushroom risotto topped with parmesan cheese and fresh herbs.

option.name: content
option.value: list 10 dish names from fictional movies and games

option.name: content
option.value: 1. Butterbeer (Harry Potter series) 2. Lembas Bread (The Lord of the Rings) 3. Roast Beast (How the Grinch Stole Christmas) 4. Krabby Patty (SpongeBob SquarePants) 5. Nuka-Cola (Fallout) 6. Slurm (Futurama) 7. Romulan Ale (Star Trek) 8. Fruity Oaty Bars (Firefly) 9. Big Kahuna Burger (Pulp Fiction) 10. Stay Puft Marshmallows (Ghostbusters)
